JobFullDesc: Empower every person and every organization on the planet to achieve more. That’s what inspires us, drives our work and pushes us to challenge the status quo every day.Global Treasury and Financial Services (GTFS) manages and protects Microsoft’s $140B in financial assets to support the digital transformation journey of Microsoft’s customers, partners & vendors by providing competitive credit and payment solutions to support revenue growth while managing credit risk. We are a compliance first organization with customer obsession and economics focus.Would you like to be part of the Treasury team within the GTFS organization and lead our operations teams? We have an opening for a Treasury Operations Director to help continue our journey in modernizing treasury operations. Through our key processes, partnerships, and technology we strive for operational excellence whether through innovation related to technology and tools, security, improved processes or empowering our team. We are looking for someone that has a growth mindset, embraces change, loves learning, and is passionate about taking everything to the next level.If you're a highly motivated, driven finance professional with great communication, intellectual curiosity, and enjoy improving processes, this is the job for you. This high visibility and impactful role offers the opportunity to stretch your skills at the highest levels of the company. The role reports to the Treasurer. ResponsibilitiesThe Treasury Operations Director will lead a core team within the Global Treasury and Financial Services organization managing our banking infrastructure, cash operations, and investment operations.The ideal candidate will:Lead with a compliance first mindset.Provide thought leadership and technological savvy by leading transformational initiatives to evolve our treasury infrastructure creating scalable, secure solutions and being an innovative leader among our peers.Identify opportunities to automate processes and streamline operational activities in response to business model shifts by collaborating with key internal and external partners.Build and maintain banking relationships, delivering value to our partners and identify and implement efficient banking structures and solutions.Strong leadership and people management skills to lead the team through change management and adapt to business, market, regulatory and technology trends such as digital assets. Represent Microsoft Treasury in standard setting bodies to influence and guide industry standards in this space.Create an inclusive environment for the team to surface innovative ideas, try new solutions and feel empowered.Inspire the team, capitalizing on the strengths of our multicultural work force, creating a positive work environment that facilitates personal accountability and collaboration. Promote a trusting and transparent working environment while supporting strategic imperatives and initiatives of other functions.QualificationsRequired/Minimum QualificationsBachelor’s Degree in Finance, Accounting, or Business AND 7+ years experience with background in treasury, finance, or accounting. Additional or Preferred QualificationsMBA (Master's in Business Administration); AND 10+ years experience with background in treasury, finance, banking, or accounting.Highly skilled in developing influential and collaborative relationships across teams, functions, and geographies.Deep understanding of Treasury and how Treasury interacts with other vital finance functions. Experience in cash management and capital markets is helpful.Strong demonstrated leadership experience with global and virtual teams a plus.Must be proficient in championing and adopting change, influencing others, contributing Treasury expertise, collaborating with internal and external stakeholders, and acting with integrity.Experience with use of data visualization tools, online banking platforms, understanding of SWIFT, SAP and other Treasury tools. Deep understanding of custody management, flow of funds, DTC, KYC and AML requirements, FBAR, and managing merchant accounts.Demonstrated experience of implementing governance models and risk management activities.Microsoft is an equal opportunity employer.
